fields.label: Tipo
fields.description: Media opzionale da mostrare sopra la domanda.

semantics.label: Descrizione attivit√†
semantics.description: Descrivere come l'utente deve risolvere il compito.
semantics.placeholder: Click on all the verbs in the text that follows.

important.description:
• Marked words are added with an asterisk (*).
  • Asterisks can be added within marked words by adding another asterisk, *correctword*** => correctword*.
important.example: The correct words are marked like this: *correctword*, an asterisk is written like this: *correctword***.

fields.label: Definisci un feedback personalizzato per ogni intervallo di punteggio
fields.description: Click the "Add range" button to add as many ranges as you need. Example: 0-20% Bad score, 21-91% Average Score, 91-100% Great Score!
